data.title: Haim Saban
data.meta_description: #1104 Haim Saban on the 2024 Billionaires - Haim Saban turned his success with children's TV show Mighty Morphin Power Rangers into Fox Family Channel,
data.text:

Alabama hired Kalen DeBoer to be its next football coach, replacing Nick Saban, who retired last week. During 17 years at Alabama, Saban won six national titles.
